survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of recent digital marketing campaigns and gather insights for future optimization.

questions.question_text: How did you first hear about our recent digital marketing campaign?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple touchpoints. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How did you first hear about our recent digital marketing campaign?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital marketing channels do you engage with most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify the most frequent channel. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted channels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital marketing channels do you engage with most frequently?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how effective was the recent digital marketing campaign in capturing your interest? (1 = Not at all effective, 5 = Very effective)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for standardized responses. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how effective was the recent digital marketing campaign in capturing your interest? (1 = Not at all effective, 5 = Very effective)

questions.question_text: What aspects of the campaign did you find most appealing? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify strengths. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What aspects of the campaign did you find most appealing? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Did the campaign prompt you to take any action (e.g., visit the website, make a purchase, sign up for a newsletter)?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to measure conversion intent. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Routing to Q6 if 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Did the campaign prompt you to take any action (e.g., visit the website, make a purchase, sign up for a newsletter)?

questions.question_text: What action did you take after engaging with the campaign?
answer_options: Followed the brand on social media
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to track specific conversions. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What action did you take after engaging with the campaign?
answer_options: Followed the brand on social media

questions.question_text: How likely are you to engage with future digital marketing campaigns from our brand? (1 = Not at all likely, 5 = Very likely)
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure future engagement intent. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to engage with future digital marketing campaigns from our brand? (1 = Not at all likely, 5 = Very likely)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future digital marketing campaigns?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text box.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future digital marketing campaigns?

questions.question_text: Which social media platforms do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify platform preferences. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which social media platforms do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you engage with brand content on social media?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge engagement frequency. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you engage with brand content on social media?
